title: Blog
subtitle: Architecture, patterns, and updates from the UI8Kit team.

posts.title: Architecture Principles
posts.excerpt: How UI8Kit's modular design enables type-safe, semantic UI development.
posts.body: UI8Kit separates layout (Block, Stack, Group), content (Title, Text), and interactive (Button, Badge) components. Each uses semantic props and data-class for styling.
posts.author: UI8Kit Team

posts.title: Constrained Tailwind + shadcn Tokens
posts.excerpt: Violet palette and design token system.
posts.body: We use a whitelist of utility props. Colors come from shadcn-style CSS variables. Primary is violet (hsl 263). Light and dark modes are fully supported.
posts.author: UI8Kit Team

posts.title: DSL for Template Generation
posts.excerpt: If, Loop, Var enable multi-engine output.
posts.body: The @ui8kit/template package provides React components that render at dev time but transform to Liquid, Handlebars, or other engines at build time.
posts.author: UI8Kit Team
